text: HEK293T cells seeded in 6 well plates were transfected with human BAG3-specific or random siRNA (DHARMACON) at a final concentration of 100nM per well using Lipofectamine reagent (INVITROGEN). At 24 hours post transfection, cells were transfected again with 0.2Î¼g of eVP40 or mVP40 plasmid. VLPs and cell extracts were harvested at 24 hours post transfection, and proteins were detected by Western blotting.
